net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.iterator
Interface ConditionalCommentCallbackHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConditionalCommentRenderer
public interface ConditionalCommentCallbackHandler

Interface for a type that is used as a callback to be invoked while iterating over a list of bundles. The callback will be invoked whenever a conditional comment should be started and finished while generating a list of paths to a bundle.

Author:
Jordi Hernández Sellés

Method Summary
 void closeConditionalComment()
          This method will be invoked to signal the need to close a conditional comment previously opened.
 void openConditionalComment(java.lang.String expression)
          This method will be invoked to signal the need to start a conditional comment, which will use the specified expression.
 

Method Detail

openConditionalComment

void openConditionalComment(java.lang.String expression)
This method will be invoked to signal the need to start a conditional comment, which will use the specified expression.

Parameters:
expression - A string specifying the conditional comment expression to use (such as 'if IE').

closeConditionalComment

void closeConditionalComment()
This method will be invoked to signal the need to close a conditional comment previously opened.
